extendedInfo.description: Automatically manage every deal email that comes into your inbox with Exuru!IMPORTANT - You need to set Exuru up on exuru.com first! It takes about 60 seconds!Have you become annoyed by the number of deal, offer and product emails that find their way into your inbox?Do you miss out on deals because you delete the emails before you've even read them?Exuru comes to the rescue! Every deal and offer email that arrives in your inbox is automatically scraped for deals, removed from your inbox leaving you to browse all of your deals in a single Android application!Over time, Exuru learns which deals you like and which you don't so that you only ever see deals you (or your friends) will be interested in.Sign up at exuru.com - all you need is a Gmail or Gmail-hosted email address and Facebook.We scan for a huge range of deal emails including those from, Groupon, LivingSocial, KGB, Wahanda, Scoutmob, Buy.com, Amazon, eBay, Blackboardeats, Dealfind, eBuyer, Gaypon, Scoopon, Frugaloo, Gumtree, Kijiji, Lifebooker, Steals network, Maplin, Plum District, Qype, Secret Escapes, SF Gate, Tanga, Vouchercloud, WTSO, WineAccess, WUSLU, Zozi and many many more!Covers deal emails from the US, UK, Canada, India, Australia, Spain and Germany.

reviews.title: refreshing app!
reviews.comment: Great functionality! No more pesky deal emails for me. I was signed up with 8 deal companies and they sent me 2-3 emails per day--annoying! This app shows all deals in 1 place. Beautifully designed, too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SERVER NOT FOUND error
reviews.comment: Not working on my ics 4 galaxy. Tried on my computer to access register-same error. Tried un/reinstall didnt work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not Good!
reviews.comment: Can\'t use it on Samsung Note. It says it loses connection to its own server on trying to connect to Facebook. This app needs some work befits its useful. For now, don\'t bother. Look elsewhere!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not Working
reviews.comment: I accepted to connect on Facebook but it\'s still stuck on the first page...
reviews.author: Edward George D\'souza

reviews.title: Login required
reviews.comment: Requires facebook login account, sorry not into facebook. Uninstalling as I cannot use it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A must for deal lovers
reviews.comment: I only use a few apps, but this one is a must! Helps to see all relevant deals in one place, no need to clutter my inbox with 10 daily newsletters from deal sites. The look is pretty nice as well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beautiful app
reviews.comment: There are a lot of ugly Android apps in the marketplace, so it\'s nice to see one as pretty as this.  As for the functionality, this service is perfect for keeping my inbox clean and uncluttered of the constant barrage of offer emails. I didn\'t even have to tell it which ones I\'d signed up to; it just knew!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Es genial!! Ya incluye ofertas de Espa\303\261a! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Infrastructure Please!
reviews.comment: I read about it, watched the fun video presentation, Installed it on my EVO 4G LTE and it would never open. I tried to log in via facebook but each time it brought up a red box with the words: \"Sorry, we lost the connection to the Exuru server. Please try again.\"  How many times am I to try again??? I tried about 10 times. This is a poor beginning to an app that seems like a cool idea. UNINSTALL!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work, can\'t connect to Exuru server.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rubbish!
reviews.comment: Unable to register. With so many complaints and negative comments you would think this would have been resolved.
reviews.author: Lydia Paton

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: Dosent even work says no connection dix it stupid or who ever made the app
reviews.author: Gabriel Gebow

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Cannot register online due to error with Exuru servers. Attempted registration multiple times. App is useless without registration.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Clean inbox, lots of deals!
reviews.comment: Have to sign up on the website first but will clean your inbox and give you all your deals in your pocket :)
reviews.author: A Google User
